ygData.subject: Another wonderful question on archery
ygData.msgSnippet: - Is there a way to get archery to work with auto-attack? As far as ive tested, you need to shut ato-attack off the hit a ranged weapon hot key in order to use
ygData.messageBody:
-
Is there a way to get archery to work with auto-attack?
As far as ive tested, you need to shut ato-attack off the hit a ranged
weapon hot key in order to use the bow.
Is there a better, quicker, more effective system than this?
Ive tried a few different things, but so far this is the only way i can
get it to work.

Also, does archery go up whenver you use it like spell casting, or is
it like melee and it only goes up when you use it against things that
give you XP?

Bathory
Cazic-Thule
